mapper.insert: insert into homeworkNoticetb(homeworkNotice_title, homeworkNotice_startDate, homeworkNotice_endDate, homeworkNotice_detail, HomeworkNotice_memberIdx) values(#{homeworkNotice_title}, #{homeworkNotice_startDate}, #{homeworkNotice_endDate}, #{homeworkNotice_detail}, #{HomeworkNotice_memberIdx})
insert into homeworktb(Homework_memberIdx, Homework_noticeIdx, Homework_url, Homework_submitDate) values(#{Homework_memberIdx}, #{Homework_noticeIdx}, #{Homework_url}, #{Homework_submitDate})
mapper.select: select * from homeworktb where Homework_noticeIdx in (select HomeworkNotice_idx from homeworkNoticetb where HomeworkNotice_memberIdx=#{memberIdx});
